messages.subject: volcanoes
messages.msgSnippet: Hi folks, Thanks for the volcano ideas, it was our curriculum today.  Didn t find that the pop and salt worked well.  We had lots of fun with making salt
messages.messageBody:
Hi folks,

Thanks for the volcano ideas, it was our "curriculum" today. Didn't
find that the pop and salt worked well. We had lots of fun with making
salt mountains and using vinegar and baking soda to make the volcanoes.
Fortunately I buy in bulk. We made a whole scene on a large plastic
tray with houses (from a game). We also looked at volcano related words
and looked up volcanoes in the encyclopedia. Didn't have much luck with
the web sites. It was a fun morning.

Sherry
